metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Electron Application CommandLine
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious CommandLine of electron apps (teams, discord, slack, etc.). This could be a sign of abuse to proxy execution through a signed binary.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\chrome.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\code.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\discord.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\githubdesktop.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\keybase.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msedge_proxy.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msedge.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msedgewebview2.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\msteams.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\slack.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\teams.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('chrome\.exe', 'code\.exe', 'discord\.exe', 'githubdesktop\.exe', 'keybase\.exe', 'msedge_proxy\.exe', 'msedge\.exe', 'msedgewebview2\.exe', 'msteams\.exe', 'slack\.exe', 'teams\.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--browser-subprocess-path')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--gpu-launcher')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--renderer-cmd-prefix')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--utility-cmd-prefix'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious CommandLine of electron apps (teams, discord, slack, etc.). This could be a sign of abuse to proxy execution through a signed binary.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage for debugging purposes References: https://positive.security/blog/ms-officecmd-rce, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Teams/, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Msedge/, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/msedgewebview2/, https://medium.com/@MalFuzzer/one-electron-to-rule-them-all-dc2e9b263daf, https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/chromium/+/master/content/public/common/content_switches.cc
